SELECT user_id ,user_email ,user_mobile ,user_name ,user_nick ,user_pwd ,user_img ,user_msg ,user_desc ,user_stat_cd ,user_join_dtm FROM app_user_info WHERE 1 = 1
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT(#{user.id},'%')
AND user_email LIKE #{user.email}||'%'
AND user_mobile LIKE #{user.mobile}||'%'
AND user_name LIKE #{user.name}||'%'
AND user_nick LIKE #{user.nickname}||'%'
AND sys_delete_yn = 'N' LIMIT ${rows} OFFSET ${(page-1)*rows}
SELECT user_id ,user_email ,user_mobile ,user_name ,user_nick ,user_pwd ,user_img ,user_msg ,user_desc ,user_stat_cd ,user_join_dtm FROM app_user_info WHERE user_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE app_user_info SET sys_update_dtm = NOW() ,sys_delete_yn = 'Y' WHERE user_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.group_id ,b.upper_group_id ,b.group_name ,b.group_desc ,b.sort_seq FROM app_user_group_map a LEFT OUTER JOIN app_group_info b ON b.group_id = a.group_id WHERE a.user_id = #{user.id}
